attributes.action: Stop the ban on realistic weapons sales, causing Airsoft to be abolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Airsoft is a huge hobby, and more so a huge community. The ban targets BB guns and also realistic weapons as such used in the sport of Airsoft. I believe skirmishers are mature and have the common sense not to go out with their weapons a hurt innocent people.

Its silly boys and girls with £5 BB pistols that have risen this bill and endangered a massive world wide sport.

Keep Airsoft alive, show the UK how big Airsoft is and how important it is to us!
